requirment.title: Knowledge of web services, specifically REST APIs over JSON
Ability to work collaboratively with highly creative designers who will push for innovation designs to be brought to life
Passion in software engineering, aplication development, or system development
Experience in iOS technology and programming language (React Native, Objective C, etc.)
Experience with web services, specifically REST APIs over JSON
Working knowledge of the general mobile landscape, architectures, trends, and emerging technology
Have good understanding in algorithm and programming language
Experience on system development and coding best-practice
Proficiency with fundamental front and languages such as HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
Proficiency with server side languages such as PHP
Familiarity with database technology such as MySQL / SQL Server / Oracle
Excellent understanding of software engineering concepts, design patterns, and algorithms
Passion in software engineering, application development, or systems development
Curiosity to explore creative solutions and try new things
